articles.title: The Sweet’s Steve Priest Dead at 72 - Pitchfork
articles.description: The glam rock band’s bassist was named in the first lines of “The Ballroom Blitz”
articles.content:
Steve Priest, the bassist who also sang in the London glam rock band the Sweet, has died. Priests bandmate Andy Scott confirmed the news in a Facebook post. He was 72.
Priest joined the Sweet in 196… [+847 chars]

articles.title: Carole Baskin awarded the zoo once owned by 'Tiger King' Joe Exotic - CNN
articles.description: Carole Baskin, whose longstanding feud with Joe Exotic was chronicled in the hit Netflix docuseries "Tiger King," has been awarded the zoo once owned by her nemesis.
